name: A Game of Luck
description:
A Game of Luck is a luck based game (obviously) where the player is represented by a 0 that can move across a 3 x 3 grid where each square is represented by numbers.

The reason A Game of Luck is a luck based game is because in the game there are also two things (I don't know what to call them) represented by x displayed on the 3 x 3 grid, the game randomly chooses one thing to be a good thing and the other to be a bad thing, you can't tell which is which so you have to test your luck and guess. whenever the player's position is the same position as one of the things that's when you have your final answer and the game tells you if you went to the good thing or the bad thing, if you went to the good thing you get a point, if you don't you lose all of your points. There's a score and highscore system and the only problem with the game is it doesn't save your highscore, so what you can do is before you close the game you can write down your highscore and then close the game. Have fun!
